faqData.question: What exactly does a school ERP system do?
faqData.answer: A school ERP system is a smart platform that handles all the daily operations of your institution in one place. From student admissions and attendance to exam schedules, fee payments and report cards, it keeps everything organised. It also connects teachers, administrators, students and parents, so everyone can see the same information and work together smoothly.

faqData.question: Can this system be used by schools of different sizes and types?
faqData.answer: Yes. Whether you're running a small kindergarten, a high school, or a large educational institution, the system can be adjusted to fit your structure. You can select only the features you need and add more as your school grows or your requirements change.
